actions.name: JSONPath Query
actions.title: Get input variables

properties.description:
get input variables 
workflow_id: Id of the target workflo to execute
channel_id: PSC identifier for request
workflow_payload: this is sent as the body of the API call to start target AO workflow
poller_frequency: time interval for polling of target workflow status

from payload (amqp request)
properties.display_name: Get input variables
